parameters.name: AliasName
parameters.description: The alias of the vulnerability that is specified in Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE).

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The cluster ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeGroupedContainerInstances](~~DescribeGroupedContainerInstances~~) operation to query the IDs of clusters.

parameters.name: ClusterName
parameters.description: The name of the cluster.

parameters.name: ContainerId
parameters.description: The container ID.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: Dealed
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the vulnerability is handled. Valid values:

**y**: The vulnerability is handled. **n**: The vulnerability is not handled.

parameters.name: Digest
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the image.

parameters.name: Image
parameters.description: The name of the image.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the container image.

>  You can call the [ListRepository](~~451339~~) operation of Container Registry and obtain the ID of the container image from **InstanceId** in the response.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the vulnerability.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description:
The namespace of the cluster.

>  You can call the [GetOpaClusterNamespaceList](~~GetOpaClusterNamespaceList~~) operation to query the namespaces of clusters.

parameters.name: Necessity
parameters.description:
The priority to fix the vulnerability. Separate multiple priorities with commas (,). Valid values:

*   **asap**: high
*   **later**: medium
*   **nntf**: low

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: Pod
parameters.description: The name of the container group.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the image repository. Valid values:

*   **cn-beijing**: China (Beijing)
*   **cn-zhangjiakou**: China (Zhangjiakou)
*   **cn-hangzhou**: China (Hangzhou)
*   **cn-shanghai**: China (Shanghai)
*   **cn-shenzhen**: China (Shenzhen)
*   **cn-hongkong**: China (Hong Kong)
*   **ap-southeast-1**: Singapore
*   **ap-southeast-5**: Indonesia (Jakarta)
*   **us-east-1**: US (Virginia)
*   **us-west-1**: US (Silicon Valley)
*   **eu-central-1**: Germany (Frankfurt)
*   **eu-west-1**: UK (London)

parameters.name: RepoId
parameters.description:
The ID of the image repository.

>  You can call the [ListRepository](~~145293~~) operation of Container Registry and obtain the ID of the image repository from **RepoId** in the response.

parameters.name: RepoInstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the container image.

>  You can call the [ListRepository](~~451339~~) operation of Container Registry and obtain the ID of the container image from **InstanceId** in the response.

parameters.name: RepoName
parameters.description:
The name of the image repository.

>  Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: RepoNamespace
parameters.description:
The namespace to which the image repository belongs.

>  Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: RepoRegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the image repository. Valid values:

*   **cn-beijing**: China (Beijing)
*   **cn-zhangjiakou**: China (Zhangjiakou)
*   **cn-hangzhou**: China (Hangzhou)
*   **cn-shanghai**: China (Shanghai)
*   **cn-shenzhen**: China (Shenzhen)
*   **cn-hongkong**: China (Hong Kong)
*   **ap-southeast-1**: Singapore
*   **ap-southeast-5**: Indonesia (Jakarta)
*   **us-east-1**: US (Virginia)
*   **us-west-1**: US (Silicon Valley)
*   **eu-central-1**: Germany (Frankfurt)
*   **eu-west-1**: UK (London)

parameters.name: ScanRange
parameters.description:
The type of the asset that you want to scan. Valid values:

*   **image**
*   **container**

parameters.name: StatusList
parameters.description:
The status of the vulnerability. Valid values:

*   **1**: The vulnerability is unfixed.
*   **4**: The vulnerability is being fixed.
*   **7**:The vulnerability is fixed.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tag to add to the image.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the vulnerability. Valid values:

*   **cve**: system vulnerability
*   **sca**: application vulnerability

parameters.name: Uuids
parameters.description: The UUID of the image. Separate multiple UUIDs with commas (,).
